facts.fact_text: Indonesia's IDX Composite tumbled 130 points, or 1.5%, to 7,976 in Friday morning trade.

evidences.evidence_text: Indonesia’s IDX Composite tumbled 130 points, or 1.5%, to 7,976 in Friday morning trade

facts.fact_text: Moody’s Investors Service changed Indonesia’s sovereign credit rating outlook from stable to negative.

evidences.evidence_text: Moody’s Investors Service changed the country’s sovereign credit rating outlook from stable to negative
The agency, meanwhile, affirmed the Baa2 rating.

facts.fact_text: Indonesia's economy grew 5.11% in 2025, below the government’s 5.2% target.

evidences.evidence_text: Earlier on Thursday, official data released showed the economy grew 5.11% in 2025, below the government’s 5.2% target

facts.fact_text: Weekly, markets are poised for their third straight drop, down 4% so far.

evidences.evidence_text: Weekly, markets are poised for their third straight drop, down 4% so far.

evidence.evidence_text: Moody’s Investors Service changed the country’s sovereign credit rating outlook from stable to negative, citing reduced policy predictability and weaker governance under President Prabowo, who took office in October 2024.
Earlier on Thursday, official data released showed the economy grew 5.11% in 2025, below the government’s 5.2% target despite robust Q4 growth.
